DOC.brief_summary: This is a phase II study to assess the efficacy of Aminoflavone prodrug in triple negative and ER+ breast cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study of Aminoflavone Prodrug to Treat Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: ER+ or TN Breast Cancer Progression on an aromatase inhibitor if ER+ Prior treatment with taxane if TN 18 years or older Adequate organ function Measurable lesion symptomatic pulmonary disease brain metastases pregnant females
